rows.name: account delete
rows.help:
Syntax: .account delete $account

Delete account with all characters.

rows.name: quest remove
rows.help:
Syntax: .quest remove #quest_id

Set quest #quest_id state to not completed and not active (and remove from active quest list) for selected player.

rows.name: additem
rows.help:
Syntax: .additem #itemid/[#itemname]/#shift-click-item-link #itemcount

Adds the specified number of items of id #itemid (or exact (!) name $itemname in brackets, or link created by shift-click at item in inventory or recipe) to your or selected character inventory. If #itemcount is omitted, only one item will be added.
.

rows.name: additemset
rows.help:
Syntax: .additemset #itemsetid

Add items from itemset of id #itemsetid to your or selected character inventory. Will add by one example each item from itemset.

rows.name: npc allowmove
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc allowmove

Enable or disable movement creatures in world. Not implemented.

rows.name: quest add
rows.help:
Syntax: .quest add #quest_id

Add to character quest log quest #quest_id. Quest started from item can't be added by this command but correct .additem call provided in command output.

rows.name: go creature
rows.help:
Syntax: .go creature (#creature_guid|$creature_name|id #creature_id)
Teleport your character to creature with guid #creature_guid, or teleport your character to creature with name including as part $creature_name substring, or teleport your character to a creature that was spawned from the template with this entry #creature_id.

rows.name: npc whisper
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc whisper #playerguid #text
Make the selected npc whisper #text to  #playerguid.

rows.name: npc spawntime
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc spawntime #time 

Adjust spawntime of selected creature to time.

rows.name: npc subname
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc subname $Name

Change the subname of the selected creature or player to $Name.

Command disabled.

rows.name: npc changelevel
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc changelevel #level

Change the level of the selected creature to #level.

#level may range from 1 to 63.

rows.name: announce
rows.help:
Syntax: .announce $MessageToBroadcast

Send a global message to all players online in chat log.

rows.name: notify
rows.help:
Syntax: .notify $MessageToBroadcast

Send a global message to all players online in screen.

rows.name: aura
rows.help:
Syntax: .aura #spellid

Add the aura from spell #spellid to the selected Unit.

rows.name: gm ingame
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm ingame

Display a list of available in game Game Masters.

rows.name: bank
rows.help:
Syntax: .bank

Show your bank inventory.

rows.name: commands
rows.help:
Syntax: .commands

Display a list of available commands for your account level.

rows.name: cooldown
rows.help:
Syntax: .cooldown [#spell_id]

Remove all (if spell_id not provided) or #spel_id spell cooldown from selected character or you (if no selection).

rows.name: npc factionid
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc factionid #factionid

Set the faction of the selected creature to #factionid.

rows.name: npc delitem
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc delitem #itemId

Remove item #itemid from item list of selected vendor.

rows.name: npc delete
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc delete [#guid]

Delete creature with guid #guid (or the selected if no guid is provided)

rows.name: delticket
rows.help:
Syntax: .delticket all
        .delticket #num
        .delticket $character_name
all to dalete all tickets at server, $character_name to delete ticket of this character, #num to delete ticket #num.

rows.name: demorph
rows.help:
Syntax: .demorph

Demorph the selected player.

rows.name: die
rows.help:
Syntax: .die

Kill the selected player. If no player is selected, it will kill you.

rows.name: dismount
rows.help:
Syntax: .dismount

Dismount you, if you are mounted.

rows.name: go grid
rows.help:
Syntax: .go grid #gridX #gridY [#mapId]

Teleport the gm to center of grid with provided indexes at map #mapId (or current map if it not provided).

rows.name: distance
rows.help:
Syntax: .distance [$name/$link]

Display the distance from your character to the selected creature/player, or player with name $name, or player/creature/gameobject pointed to shift-link with guid.

rows.name: go xy
rows.help:
Syntax: .go xy #x #y [#mapid]

Teleport player to point with (#x,#y) coordinates at ground(water) level at map #mapid or same map if #mapid not provided.

rows.name: debug play cinematic
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug play cinematic #cinematicid

Play cinematic #cinematicid for you. You stay at place while your mind fly.

rows.name: debug play sound
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug play sound #soundid

Play sound with #soundid.
Sound will be play only for you. Other players do not hear this.
Warning: client may have more 5000 sounds...

rows.name: explorecheat
rows.help:
Syntax: .explorecheat #flag

Reveal  or hide all maps for the selected player. If no player is selected, hide or reveal maps to you.

Use a #flag of value 1 to reveal, use a #flag value of 0 to hide all maps.

rows.name: npc additem
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc additem #itemId <#maxcount><#incrtime><#extendedcost>r

Add item #itemid to item list of selected vendor. Also optionally set max count item in vendor item list and time to item count restoring and items ExtendedCost.

rows.name: modify morph
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify morph #displayid

Change your current model id to #displayid.

rows.name: npc add
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc add #creatureid

Spawn a creature by the given template id of #creatureid.

rows.name: gm
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm [on/off]

Enable or Disable in game GM MODE or show current state of on/off not provided.

rows.name: modify drunk
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify drunk #value
 Set drunk level to #value (0..100). Value 0 remove drunk state, 100 is max drunked state.

rows.name: guild create
rows.help:
Syntax: .guild create [$GuildLeaderName] "$GuildName"

Create a guild named $GuildName with the player $GuildLeaderName (or selected) as leader.  Guild name must in quotes.

rows.name: guild rank
rows.help:
Syntax: .guild rank [$CharacterName] #Rank

Set for player $CharacterName (or selected) rank #Rank in a guild.

rows.name: list creature
rows.help:
Syntax: .list creature #creature_id [#max_count]

Output creatures with creature id #creature_id found in world. Output creature guids and coordinates sorted by distance from character. Will be output maximum #max_count creatures. If #max_count not provided use 10 as default value.

rows.name: gobject turn
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject turn #goguid 

Set for gameobject #goguid orientation same as current character orientation.

rows.name: gps
rows.help:
Syntax: .gps [$name|$shift-link]

Display the position information for a selected character or creature (also if player name $name provided then for named player, or if creature/gameobject shift-link provided then pointed creature/gameobject if it loaded). Position information includes X, Y, Z, and orientation, map Id and zone Id

rows.name: guild invite
rows.help:
Syntax: .guild invite [$CharacterName] "$GuildName"

Add player $CharacterName (or selected) into a guild $GuildName. Guild name must in quotes.

rows.name: guid
rows.help:
Syntax: .guid

Display the GUID for the selected character.

rows.name: hidearea
rows.help:
Syntax: .hidearea #areaid

Hide the area of #areaid to the selected character. If no character is selected, hide this area to you.

rows.name: honor add
rows.help:
Syntax: .honor add $amount

Add a certain amount of honor (gained today) to the selected player.

rows.name: honor addkill
rows.help:
Syntax: .honor addkill

Add the targeted unit as one of your pvp kills today (you only get honor if it's a racial leader or a player)

rows.name: honor update
rows.help:
Syntax: .honor update

Force the yesterday's honor fields to be updated with today's data, which will get reset for the selected player.

rows.name: server idleshutdown cancel
rows.help:
Syntax: .server idleshutdown cancel

Cancel the restart/shutdown timer if any.

rows.name: server exit
rows.help:
Syntax: .server exit

Terminate mangosd NOW. Exit code 0.

rows.name: server idleshutdown
rows.help:
Syntax: .server idleshutdown #delay [#exist_code]

Shut the server down after #delay seconds if no active connections are present (no players). Use #exist_code or 0 as program exist code.

rows.name: itemmove
rows.help:
Syntax: .itemmove #sourceslotid #destinationslotid

Move an item from slots #sourceslotid to #destinationslotid in your inventory

Not yet implemented

rows.name: kick
rows.help:
Syntax: .kick [$charactername]

Kick the given character name from the world. If no character name is provided then the selected player (except for yourself) will be kicked.

rows.name: learn all
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all

Learn all big set different spell maybe useful for Administaror.

rows.name: learn all_crafts
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn crafts

Learn all professions and recipes.

rows.name: learn all_gm
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_gm

Learn all default spells for Game Masters.

rows.name: learn all_lang
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_lang

Learn all languages

rows.name: learn all_myclass
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_myclass

Learn all spells and talents available for his class.

rows.name: learn all_myspells
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_myspells

Learn all spells (except talents and spells with first rank learned as talent) available for his class.

rows.name: learn all_mytalents
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_mytalents

Learn all talents (and spells with first rank learned as talent) available for his class.

rows.name: setskill
rows.help:
Syntax: .setskill #skill #level [#max]

Set a skill of id #skill with a current skill value of #level and a maximum value of #max (or equal current maximum if not provide) for the selected character. If no character is selected, you learn the skill.

rows.name: levelup
rows.help:
Syntax: .levelup [$playername] [#numberoflevels]

Increase/decrease the level of character with $playername (or the selected if not name provided) by #numberoflevels Or +1 if no #numberoflevels provided). If #numberoflevels is omitted, the level will be increase by 1. If #numberoflevels is 0, the same level will be restarted. If no character is selected and name not provided, increase your level. Command can be used for offline character. All stats and dependent values recalculated. At level decrease talents can be reset if need. Also at level decrease equipped items with greater level requirement can be lost.

rows.name: linkgrave
rows.help:
Syntax: .linkgrave #graveyard_id [alliance|horde]

Link current zone to graveyard for any (or alliance/horde faction ghosts). This let character ghost from zone teleport to graveyard after die if graveyard is nearest from linked to zone and accept ghost of this faction. Add only single graveyard at another map and only if no graveyards linked (or planned linked at same map).

rows.name: gobject delete
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject delete #go_guid
Delete gameobject with guid #go_guid.

rows.name: gobject move
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject move #goguid [#x #y #z]

Move gameobject #goguid to character coordinates (or to (#x,#y,#z) coordinates if its provide).

rows.name: gobject add
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject add #id <spawntimeSecs>

Add a game object from game object templates to the world at your current location using the #id.
spawntimesecs sets the spawntime, it is optional.

Note: this is a copy of .gameobject.

rows.name: go xyz
rows.help:
Syntax: .go xyz #x #y #z [#mapid]

Teleport player to point with (#x,#y,#z) coordinates at ground(water) level at map #mapid or same map if #mapid not provided.

rows.name: go zonexy
rows.help:
Syntax: .go zonexy #x #y [#zone]

Teleport player to point with (#x,#y) client coordinates at ground(water) level in zone #zoneid or current zone if #zoneid not provided. You can look up zone using .lookup area $namepart

rows.name: loadscripts
rows.help:
Syntax: .loadscripts $scriptlibraryname

Unload current and load the script library $scriptlibraryname or reload current if $scriptlibraryname omitted, in case you changed it while the server was running.

rows.name: account password
rows.help:
Syntax: .account password $old_password $new_password $new_password

Change your account password.

rows.name: lookup spell
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup spell $namepart

Looks up a spell by $namepart, and returns all matches with their spell ID's.

rows.name: lookup quest
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup quest $namepart

Looks up a quest by $namepart, and returns all matches with their quest ID's.

rows.name: lookup skill
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup skill $$namepart

Looks up a skill by $namepart, and returns all matches with their skill ID's.

rows.name: lookup object
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup object $objname

Looks up an gameobject by $objname, and returns all matches with their Gameobject ID's.

rows.name: lookup itemset
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup itemset $itemname

Looks up an item set by $itemname, and returns all matches with their Item set ID's.

rows.name: lookup item
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup item $itemname

Looks up an item by $itemname, and returns all matches with their Item ID's.

rows.name: lookup creature
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup creature $namepart

Looks up a creature by $namepart, and returns all matches with their creature ID's.

rows.name: maxskill
rows.help:
Syntax: .maxskill
Sets all skills of the targeted player to their maximum values for its current level.

rows.name: modify aspeed
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify aspeed #rate

Modify all speeds -run,swim,run back,swim back- of the selected player to "normalbase speed for this move type"*rate. If no player is selected, modify your speed.

 #rate may range from 0.1 to 10.

rows.name: modify bwalk
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify bwalk #rate

Modify the speed of the selected player while running backwards to "normal walk back speed"*rate. If no player is selected, modify your speed.

 #rate may range from 0.1 to 10.

rows.name: modify energy
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify energy #energy

Modify the energy of the selected player. If no player is selected, modify your energy.

rows.name: modify faction
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify faction #factionid #flagid #npcflagid #dynamicflagid

Modify the faction and flags of the selected creature. Without arguments, display the faction and flags of the selected creature.

rows.name: gobject near
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject near  [#distance]

Output gameobjects at distance #distance from player. Output gameobject guids and coordinates sorted by distance from character. If #distance not provided use 10 as default value.

rows.name: modify hp
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify hp #newhp

Modify the hp of the selected player. If no player is selected, modify your hp.

rows.name: modify mana
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify mana #newmana

Modify the mana of the selected player. If no player is selected, modify your mana.

rows.name: modify rage
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify rage #newrage

Modify the rage of the selected player. If no player is selected, modify your rage.

rows.name: modify scale
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify scale #scale

Change model scale for targeted player (util relogin) or creature (until respawn).

rows.name: gm fly
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm fly [on/off]
Enable/disable gm fly mode.

rows.name: debug getitemvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug getitemvalue #itemguid #field [int|hex|bit|float]

Get the field #field of the item #itemguid in your inventroy.

Use type arg for set output format: int (decimal number), hex (hex value), bit (bitstring), float. By default use integer output.

rows.name: modify swim
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify swim #rate

Modify the swim speed of the selected player to "normal swim speed"*rate. If no player is selected, modify your speed.

 #rate may range from 0.1 to 10.

rows.name: banlist ip
rows.help:
Syntax: .banlist ip [$Ip]
Searches the banlist for a IP pattern or show full list of IP bans.

rows.name: npc spawndist
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc spawndist #dist

Adjust spawndistance of selected creature to dist.

rows.name: movegens
rows.help:
Syntax: .movegens
  Show movement generators stack for selected creature or player.

rows.name: goname
rows.help:
Syntax: .goname [$charactername]

Teleport to the given character. Either specify the character name or click on the character's portrait, e.g. when you are in a group. Character can be offline.

rows.name: baninfo account
rows.help:
Syntax: .baninfo account $accountid
Watch full information about a specific ban.

rows.name: npc setmovetype
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc setmovetype [#creature_guid] stay/random/way [NODEL]

Set for creature pointed by #creature_guid (or selected if #creature_guid not provided) movement type and move it to respawn position (if creature alive). Any existing waypoints for creature will be removed from the database if you do not use NODEL. If the creature is dead then movement type will applied at creature respawn.
Make sure you use NODEL, if you want to keep the waypoints.

rows.name: baninfo ip
rows.help:
Syntax: .baninfo ip $ip
Watch full information about a specific ban.

rows.name: npc setmodel
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc setmodel #displayid

Change the model id of the selected creature to #displayid.

rows.name: neargrave
rows.help:
Syntax: .neargrave [alliance|horde]

Find nearest graveyard linked to zone (or only nearest from accepts alliance or horde faction ghosts).

rows.name: npc move
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc move [#creature_guid]

Move the targeted creature spawn point to your coordinates.

rows.name: npc name
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc name $name

Change the name of the selected creature or character to $name.

Command disabled.

rows.name: npc info
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc info

Display a list of details for the selected creature.

The list includes:
- GUID, Faction, NPC flags, Entry ID, Model ID,
- Level,
- Health (current/maximum),

- Field flags, dynamic flags, faction template, 
- Position information,
- and the creature type, e.g. if the creature is a vendor.

rows.name: account lock
rows.help:
Syntax: .account lock [on|off]

Allow login from account only from current used IP or remove this requirement.

rows.name: pinfo
rows.help:
Syntax: .pinfo [$player_name]

Output account information for selected player or player find by $player_name.

rows.name: character reputation
rows.help:
Syntax: .character reputation [$player_name]

Show reputation information for selected player or player find by $player_name.

rows.name: server plimit
rows.help:
Syntax: .server plimit [#num|-1|-2|-3|reset|player|moderator|gamemaster|administrator]

Without arg show current player amount and security level limitations for login to server, with arg set player linit ($num > 0) or securiti limitation ($num < 0 or security leme name. With `reset` sets player limit to the one in the config file

rows.name: recall
rows.help:
Syntax: .recall [$playername]

Teleport $playername or selected player to the place where he has been before last use of a teleportation command. If no $playername is entered and no player is selected, it will teleport you.

rows.name: reload all
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all

Reload all tables with reload support added and that can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: reload all_area
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_area

Reload all `areatrigger_*` tables if reload support added for this table and this table can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: reload all_loot
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_loot

Reload all `*_loot_template` tables. This can be slow operation with lags for server run.

rows.name: reload all_quest
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_quest

Reload all quest related tables if reload support added for this table and this table can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: reload all_spell
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all

Reload all `spell_*` tables with reload support added and that can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: go
rows.help:
Syntax: .go  [$playername|pointlink|#x #y #z [#mapid]]
Teleport your character to point with coordinates of player $playername, or coordinates of one from shift-link types: player, tele, taxinode, creature/creature_entry, gameobject/gameobject_entry, or explicit #x #y #z #mapid coordinates.

rows.name: go graveyard
rows.help:
Syntax: .go graveyard #graveyardId
 Teleport to graveyard with the graveyardId specified.

rows.name: guild uninvite
rows.help:
Syntax: .guild uninvite [$CharacterName]

Remove player $CharacterName (or selected) from a guild.

rows.name: mute
rows.help:
Syntax: .mute [$playerName] $timeInMinutes

Disible chat messaging for any character from account of character $playerName (or currently selected) at $timeInMinutes minutes. Player can be offline.

rows.name: ban ip
rows.help:
Syntax: .ban ip $Ip $bantime $reason
Ban IP.
$bantime: negative value leads to permban, otherwise use a timestring like "4d20h3s".

rows.name: ban character
rows.help:
Syntax: .ban character $Name $bantime $reason
Ban account and kick player.
$bantime: negative value leads to permban, otherwise use a timestring like "4d20h3s".

rows.name: respawn
rows.help:
Syntax: .respawn

Respawn selected creature or respawn all nearest creatures (if none selected) and GO without waiting respawn time expiration.

rows.name: revive
rows.help:
Syntax: .revive

Revive the selected player. If no player is selected, it will revive you.

rows.name: save
rows.help:
Syntax: .save

Saves your character.

rows.name: saveall
rows.help:
Syntax: .saveall

Save all characters in game.

rows.name: account
rows.help:
Syntax: .account

Display the access level of your account.

rows.name: account create
rows.help:
Syntax: .account create $account $password [$expansion]

Create account and set password to it. Optionally, you may also set another expansion for this account than the defined default value.

rows.name: send mail
rows.help:
Syntax: .send mail #playername "#subject" "#text"

Send a mail to a player. Subject and mail text must be in "".

rows.name: send message
rows.help:
Syntax: .send message $playername $message

Send screen message to player from ADMINISTRATOR.

rows.name: send money
rows.help:
Syntax: .send money #playername "#subject" "#text" #money

Send mail with money to a player. Subject and mail text must be in "".

rows.name: trigger active
rows.help:
Syntax: .trigger active

Show list of areatriggers with activation zone including current character position.

rows.name: gm visible
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm visible on/off

Output current visibility state or make GM visible(on) and invisible(off) for other players.

rows.name: modify arena
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify arena #value
Add $amount arena points to the selected player.

rows.name: modify standstate
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify standstate #emoteid

Change the emote of your character while standing to #emoteid.

rows.name: showarea
rows.help:
Syntax: .showarea #areaid

Reveal the area of #areaid to the selected character. If no character is selected, reveal this area to you.

rows.name: debug moditemvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug moditemvalue #guid #field [int|float| &= | |= | &=~ ] #value

Modify the field #field of the item #itemguid in your inventroy by value #value. 

Use type arg for set mode of modification: int (normal add/subtract #value as decimal number), float (add/subtract #value as float number), &= (bit and, set to 0 all bits in value if it not set to 1 in #value as hex number), |= (bit or, set to 1 all bits in value if it set to 1 in #value as hex number), &=~ (bit and not, set to 0 all bits in value if it set to 1 in #value as hex number). By default expect integer add/subtract.

rows.name: server info
rows.help:
Syntax: .server info

Display server version and the number of connected players.

rows.name: debug getvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug getvalue #field [int|hex|bit|float]

Get the field #field of the selected target. If no target is selected, get the content of your field.

Use type arg for set output format: int (decimal number), hex (hex value), bit (bitstring), float. By default use integer output.

rows.name: start
rows.help:
Syntax: .start

Teleport you to the starting area of your character.

rows.name: taxicheat
rows.help:
Syntax: .taxicheat on/off

Temporary grant access or remove to all taxi routes for the selected character. If no character is selected, hide or reveal all routes to you.

Visited taxi nodes sill accessible after removing access.

rows.name: ticket
rows.help:
Syntax: .ticket on
        .ticket off
        .ticket #num
        .ticket $character_name
        .ticket respond #num $response
        .ticket respond $character_name $response

on/off for GMs to show or not a new ticket directly, $character_name to show ticket of this character, #num to show ticket #num.

rows.name: help
rows.help:
Syntax: .help [$command]

Display usage instructions for the given $command. If no $command provided show list available commands.

rows.name: unaura
rows.help:
Syntax: .unaura #spellid

Remove aura due to spell #spellid from the selected Unit.

rows.name: reset honor
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset honor [Playername]
  Reset all honor data for targeted character.

rows.name: learn
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn #spell [all]

Selected character learn a spell of id #spell. If 'all' provided then all ranks learned.

rows.name: unlearn
rows.help:
Syntax: .unlearn #spell [all]

Unlearn for selected player a spell #spell.  If 'all' provided then all ranks unlearned.

rows.name: cast
rows.help:
Syntax: .cast #spellid [triggered]
  Cast #spellid to selected target. If no target selected cast to self. If 'trigered' or part provided then spell casted with triggered flag.

rows.name: debug anim
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug anim #emoteid

Play emote #emoteid for your character.

rows.name: cast back
rows.help:
Syntax: .cast back #spellid [triggered]
  Selected target will cast #spellid to your character. If 'trigered' or part provided then spell casted with triggered flag.

rows.name: wchange
rows.help:
Syntax: .wchange #weathertype #status

Set current weather to #weathertype with an intensity of #status.

#weathertype can be 1 for rain, 2 for snow, and 3 for sand. #status can be 0 for disabled, and 1 for enabled.

rows.name: whispers
rows.help:
Syntax: .whispers on|off
Enable/disable accepting whispers by GM from players. By default use mangosd.conf setting.

rows.name: stable
rows.help:
Syntax: .stable

Show your pet stable.

rows.name: wp show
rows.help:
Syntax: .wp show command [dbGuid] [pathId [wpOrigin] ]
where command can have one of the following values
on (to show all related wp)
first (to see only first one)
last (to see only last one)
off (to hide all related wp)
info (to get more info about theses wp)

For using info you have to do first show on and than select a Visual-Waypoint and do the show info!
with pathId and wpOrigin you can specify which path to show (optional)

rows.name: wp add
rows.help: Syntax: .wp add [Selected Creature or dbGuid] [pathId [wpOrigin] ]

rows.name: wp modify
rows.help:
Syntax: .wp modify command [dbGuid, id] [value]
where command must be one of: waittime  | scriptid | orientation | del | move
If no waypoint was selected, one can be chosen with dbGuid and id.
The commands have the following meaning:
 waittime (Set the time the npc will wait at a point (in ms))
 scriptid (Set the DB-Script that will be executed when the wp is reached)
 orientation (Set the orientation of this point) 
 del (Remove the waypoint from the path)
 move (Move the wayoint to the current position of the player)

rows.name: list item
rows.help:
Syntax: .list item #item_id [#max_count]

Output items with item id #item_id found in all character inventories, mails, auctions, and guild banks. Output item guids, item owner guid, owner account and owner name (guild name and guid in case guild bank). Will be output maximum #max_count items. If #max_count not provided use 10 as default value.

rows.name: lookup tele
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup tele $substring

Search and output all .tele command locations with provide $substring in name.

rows.name: lookup area
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup area $namepart

Looks up an area by $namepart, and returns all matches with their area ID's.

rows.name: modify mount
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify mount #id #speed
Display selected player as mounted at #id creature and set speed to #speed value.

rows.name: tele
rows.help:
Syntax: .tele #location

Teleport player to a given location.

rows.name: groupgo
rows.help:
Syntax: .groupgo [$charactername]

Teleport the given character and his group to you. Teleported only online characters but original selected group member can be offline.

rows.name: npc flag
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc flag #npcflag

Set the NPC flags of creature template of the selected creature and selected creature to #npcflag. NPC flags will applied to all creatures of selected creature template after server restart or grid unload/load.

rows.name: learn all_default
rows.help:
Syntax: .learn all_default [$playername]

Learn for selected/$playername player all default spells for his race/class and spells rewarded by completed quests.

rows.name: npc playemote
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc playemote #emoteid

Make the selected creature emote with an emote of id #emoteid.

rows.name: modify rep
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify rep #repId (#repvalue | $rankname [#delta])
Sets the selected players reputation with faction #repId to #repvalue or to $reprank.
If the reputation rank name is provided, the resulting reputation will be the lowest reputation for that rank plus the delta amount, if specified.
You can use '.pinfo rep' to list all known reputation ids, or use '.lookup faction $name' to locate a specific faction id.

rows.name: modify honor
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify honor $amount

Add $amount honor points to the selected player.

rows.name: lookup faction
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup faction $name
Attempts to find the ID of the faction with the provided $name.

rows.name: npc addweapon
rows.help: Not yet implemented.

rows.name: list object
rows.help:
Syntax: .list object #gameobject_id [#max_count]

Output gameobjects with gameobject id #gameobject_id found in world. Output gameobject guids and coordinates sorted by distance from character. Will be output maximum #max_count gameobject. If #max_count not provided use 10 as default value.

rows.name: reset all
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset all spells

Syntax: .reset all talents

Request reset spells or talents at next login each existed character.

rows.name: gobject target
rows.help:
Syntax: .gobject target [#go_id|#go_name_part]

Locate and show position nearest gameobject. If #go_id or #go_name_part provide then locate and show position of nearest gameobject with gameobject template id #go_id or name included #go_name_part as part.

rows.name: tele add
rows.help:
Syntax: .tele add $name

Add current your position to .tele command target locations list with name $name.

rows.name: tele del
rows.help:
Syntax: .tele del $name

Remove location with name $name for .tele command locations list.

rows.name: tele group
rows.help:
Syntax: .tele group#location

Teleport a selected player and his group members to a given location.

rows.name: baninfo character
rows.help:
Syntax: .baninfo character $charactername 
Watch full information about a specific ban.

rows.name: damage
rows.help:
Syntax: .damage $damage_amount [$school [$spellid]]

Apply $damage to target. If not $school and $spellid provided then this flat clean melee damage without any modifiers. If $school provided then damage modified by armor reduction (if school physical), and target absorbing modifiers and result applied as melee damage to target. If spell provided then damage modified and applied as spell damage. $spellid can be shift-link.

rows.name: wp export
rows.help: Syntax: .wp export [#creature_guid or Select a Creature] $filename

rows.name: lookup event
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup event $name
Attempts to find the ID of the event with the provided $name.

rows.name: event
rows.help:
Syntax: .event #event_id
Show details about event with #event_id.

rows.name: event list
rows.help:
Syntax: .event list
Show list of currently active events.
Show list of all events

rows.name: event start
rows.help:
Syntax: .event start #event_id
Start event #event_id. Set start time for event to current moment (change not saved in DB).

rows.name: event stop
rows.help:
Syntax: .event stop #event_id
Stop event #event_id. Set start time for event to time in past that make current moment is event stop time (change not saved in DB).

rows.name: combatstop
rows.help:
Syntax: .combatstop [$playername]
Stop combat for selected character. If selected non-player then command applied to self. If $playername provided then attempt applied to online player $playername.

rows.name: quest complete
rows.help:
Syntax: .quest complete #questid
Mark all quest objectives as completed for target character active quest. After this target character can go and get quest reward.

rows.name: cast self
rows.help:
Syntax: .cast self #spellid [triggered]
Cast #spellid by target at target itself. If 'trigered' or part provided then spell casted with triggered flag.

rows.name: cast target
rows.help:
Syntax: .cast target #spellid [triggered]
  Selected target will cast #spellid to his victim. If 'trigered' or part provided then spell casted with triggered flag.

rows.name: instance unbind
rows.help:
Syntax: .instance unbind all
  All of the selected
player's binds will be cleared.
.instance unbind #mapid
 Only the
specified #mapid instance will be cleared.

rows.name: instance listbinds
rows.help:
Syntax: .instance listbinds
  Lists the binds of the selected player.

rows.name: instance stats
rows.help:
Syntax: .instance stats
  Shows statistics about instances.

rows.name: instance savedata
rows.help:
Syntax: .instance savedata
  Save the InstanceData for the current player's map to the DB.

rows.name: learn all_recipes
rows.help: Syntax: .learn all_recipes [$profession]Learns all recipes of specified profession and sets skill level to max.Example: .learn all_recipes enchanting

rows.name: cast dist
rows.help:
Syntax: .cast dist #spellid [#dist [triggered]]
  You will cast spell to pint at distance #dist. If 'trigered' or part provided then spell casted with triggered flag. Not all spells can be casted as area spells.

rows.name: server idlerestart
rows.help:
Syntax: .server idlerestart #delay

Restart the server after #delay seconds if no active connections are present (no players). Use #exist_code or 2 as program exist code.

rows.name: server idlerestart cancel
rows.help:
Syntax: .server idlerestart cancel

Cancel the restart/shutdown timer if any.

rows.name: reload config
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload config

Reload config settings (by default stored in mangosd.conf). Not all settings can be change at reload: some new setting values will be ignored until restart, some values will applied with delay or only to new objects/maps, some values will explicitly rejected to change at reload.

rows.name: modify money
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify money #money
.money #money

Add or remove money to the selected player. If no player is selected, modify your money.

 #gold can be negative to remove money.

rows.name: lookup account ip
rows.help:
Syntax: lookup account ip $ippart [#limit] 

 Searchs accounts, which last used ip inluding $ippart (textual) with optional parametr #$limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: lookup account email
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup account email $emailpart [#limit] 

 Searchs accounts, which email including $emailpart with optional parametr #limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: gm chat
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm chat [on/off]

Enable or disable chat GM MODE (show gm badge in messages) or show current state of on/off not provided.

rows.name: reload all_locales
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_locales

Reload all `locales_*` tables with reload support added and that can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: account onlinelist
rows.help:
Syntax: .account onlinelist

Show list of online accounts.

rows.name: reset spells
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset spells [Playername]
  Removes all non-original spells from spellbook.
. Playername can be name of offline character.

rows.name: account characters
rows.help:
Syntax: .account characters [#accountId|$accountName]

Show list all characters for account selected by provided #accountId or $accountName, or for selected player in game.

rows.name: account set addon
rows.help:
Syntax: .account set addon [#accountId|$accountName] #addon

Set user (possible targeted) expansion addon level allowed. Addon values: 0 - normal, 1 - tbc, 2 - wotlk.

rows.name: gm list
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm list

Display a list of all Game Masters accounts and security levels.

rows.name: reset level
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset level [Playername]
  Reset level to 1 including reset stats and talents.  Equipped items with greater level requirement can be lost.

rows.name: server corpses
rows.help:
Syntax: .server corpses

Triggering corpses expire check in world.

rows.name: server restart
rows.help:
Syntax: .server restart #delay

Restart the server after #delay seconds. Use #exist_code or 2 as program exist code.

rows.name: server motd
rows.help:
Syntax: .server motd

Show server Message of the day.

rows.name: server log filter
rows.help:
Syntax: .server log filter [($filtername|all) (on|off)]

Show or set server log filters. If used "all" then all filters will be set to on/off state.

rows.name: server set motd
rows.help:
Syntax: .server set motd $MOTD

Set server Message of the day.

rows.name: pdump load
rows.help:
Syntax: .pdump load $filename $account [$newname] [$newguid]
Load character dump from dump file into character list of $account with saved or $newname, with saved (or first free) or $newguid guid.

rows.name: pdump write
rows.help:
Syntax: .pdump write $filename $playerNameOrGUID
Write character dump with name/guid $playerNameOrGUID to file $filename.

rows.name: character titles
rows.help:
Syntax: .character titles [$player_name]

Show known titles list for selected player or player find by $player_name.

rows.name: modify speed
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify speed #rate
.speed #rate

Modify the running speed of the selected player to "normal base run speed"*rate. If no player is selected, modify your speed.

 #rate may range from 0.1 to 10.

rows.name: ban account
rows.help:
Syntax: .ban account $Name $bantime $reason
Ban account kick player.
$bantime: negative value leads to permban, otherwise use a timestring like "4d20h3s".

rows.name: account set gmlevel
rows.help:
Syntax: .account set gmlevel [#accountId|$accountName] #level

Set the security level for targeted player (can't be used at self) or for #accountId or $accountName to a level of #level.

#level may range from 0 to 3.

rows.name: banlist account
rows.help:
Syntax: .banlist account [$Name]
Searches the banlist for a account name pattern or show full list account bans.

rows.name: banlist character
rows.help:
Syntax: .banlist character $Name
Searches the banlist for a character name pattern. Pattern required.

rows.name: repairitems
rows.help:
Syntax: .repairitems

Repair all selected player's items.

rows.name: npc follow
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc follow

Selected creature start follow you until death/fight/etc.

rows.name: npc unfollow
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc unfollow

Selected creature (non pet) stop follow you.

rows.name: waterwalk
rows.help:
Syntax: .waterwalk on/off

Set on/off waterwalk state for selected player.

rows.name: npc tame
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc tame

Tame selected creature (tameable non pet creature). You don't must have pet.

rows.name: modify gender
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify gender male/female

Change gender of selected player.

rows.name: send items
rows.help:
Syntax: .send items #playername "#subject" "#text" itemid1[:count1] itemid2[:count2] ... itemidN[:countN]

Send a mail to a player. Subject and mail text must be in "". If for itemid not provided related count values then expected 1, if count > max items in stack then items will be send in required amount stacks. All stacks amount in mail limited to 12.

rows.name: server restart cancel
rows.help:
Syntax: .server restart cancel

Cancel the restart/shutdown timer if any.

rows.name: server shutdown
rows.help:
Syntax: .server shutdown #delay [#exit_code]

Shut the server down after #delay seconds. Use #exit_code or 0 as program exit code.

rows.name: server shutdown cancel
rows.help:
Syntax: .server shutdown cancel

Cancel the restart/shutdown timer if any.

rows.name: flusharenapoints
rows.help:
Syntax: .flusharenapoints

Use it to distribute arena points based on arena team ratings, and start a new week.

rows.name: debug arena
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug arena

Toggle debug mode for arenas. In debug mode GM can start arena with single player.

rows.name: debug bg
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug bg

Toggle debug mode for battlegrounds. In debug mode GM can start battleground with single player.

rows.name: npc setdeathstate
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc setdeathstate on/off

Set default death state (dead/alive) for npc at spawn.

rows.name: reset stats
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset stats [Playername]
  Resets(recalculate) all stats of the targeted player to their original VALUESat current level.

rows.name: reset talents
rows.help:
Syntax: .reset talents [Playername]
  Removes all talents of the targeted player. Playername can be name of offline character.

rows.name: unban account
rows.help:
Syntax: .unban account $Name
Unban accounts for account name pattern.

rows.name: unban character
rows.help:
Syntax: .unban character $Name
Unban accounts for character name pattern.

rows.name: unban ip
rows.help:
Syntax : .unban ip $Ip
Unban accounts for IP pattern.

rows.name: npc textemote
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc textemote #emoteid

Make the selected creature to do textemote with an emote of id #emoteid.

rows.name: character erase
rows.help:
Syntax: .character erase $name

Delete character $name. Character finally deleted in case any deleting options.

rows.name: character rename
rows.help:
Syntax: .character rename [$name]

Mark selected in game or by $name in command character for rename at next login.

rows.name: character level
rows.help:
Syntax: .character level [$playername] [#level]

Set the level of character with $playername (or the selected if not name provided) by #numberoflevels Or +1 if no #numberoflevels provided). If #numberoflevels is omitted, the level will be increase by 1. If #numberoflevels is 0, the same level will be restarted. If no character is selected and name not provided, increase your level. Command can be used for offline character. All stats and dependent values recalculated. At level decrease talents can be reset if need. Also at level decrease equipped items with greater level requirement can be lost.

rows.name: go taxinode
rows.help:
Syntax: .go taxinode #taxinode

Teleport player to taxinode coordinates. You can look up zone using .lookup taxinode $namepart

rows.name: lookup taxinode
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup taxinode $substring

Search and output all taxinodes with provide $substring in name.

rows.name: namego
rows.help:
Syntax: .namego [$charactername]

Teleport the given character to you. Character can be offline.

rows.name: tele name
rows.help:
Syntax: .tele name [#playername] #location

Teleport the given character to a given location. Character can be offline.

rows.name: unmute
rows.help:
Syntax: .unmute [$playerName]

Restore chat messaging for any character from account of character $playerName (or selected). Character can be ofline.

rows.name: guild delete
rows.help:
Syntax: .guild delete "$GuildName"

Delete guild $GuildName. Guild name must in quotes.

rows.name: titles add
rows.help:
Syntax: .titles add #title
Add title #title (id or shift-link) to known titles list for selected player.

rows.name: titles current
rows.help:
Syntax: .titles current #title
Set title #title (id or shift-link) as current selected titl for selected player. If title not in known title list for player then it will be added to list.

rows.name: titles remove
rows.help:
Syntax: .titles remove #title
Remove title #title (id or shift-link) from known titles list for selected player.

rows.name: titles setmask
rows.help:
Syntax: .titles setmask #mask

Allows user to use all titles from #mask.

 #mask=0 disables the title-choose-field

rows.name: lookup title
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup title $$namepart

Looks up a title by $namepart, and returns all matches with their title ID's and index's.

rows.name: quit
rows.help:
Syntax: quit

Close RA connection. Command must be typed fully (quit).

rows.name: modify fly
rows.help:
Syntax: .modify fly #rate
.fly #rate

Modify the flying speed of the selected player to "normal base fly speed"*rate. If no player is selected, modify your fly.

 #rate may range from 0.1 to 10.

rows.name: npc say
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc say #text
Make the selected npc says #text.

rows.name: npc yell
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc yell #text
Make the selected npc yells #text.

rows.name: reload all_eventai
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_eventai

Reload `creature_ai_*` tables if reload support added for these tables and these tables can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: reload all_item
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_item

Reload `item_required_target`, `page_texts` and `item_enchantment_template` tables.

rows.name: reload all_npc
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_npc

Reload `points_of_interest` and `npc_*` tables if reload support added for these tables and these tables can be _safe_ reloaded.

rows.name: reload all_scripts
rows.help:
Syntax: .reload all_scripts

Reload `dbscripts_on_*` tables.

rows.name: list talents
rows.help:
Syntax: .list talents

Show list all really known (as learned spells) talent rank spells for selected player or self.

rows.name: character deleted old
rows.help:
Syntax: .character deleted old [#keepDays]

Completely deletes all characters with deleted time longer #keepDays. If #keepDays not provided the  used value from mangosd.conf option 'CharDelete.KeepDays'. If referenced config option disabled (use 0 value) then command can't be used without #keepDays.

rows.name: character deleted delete
rows.help:
Syntax: .character deleted delete #guid|$name

Completely deletes the selected characters.
If $name is supplied, only characters with that string in their name will be deleted, if #guid is supplied, only the character with that GUID will be deleted.

rows.name: character deleted list
rows.help:
Syntax: .character deleted list [#guid|$name]

Shows a list with all deleted characters.
If $name is supplied, only characters with that string in their name will be selected, if #guid is supplied, only the character with that GUID will be selected.

rows.name: character deleted restore
rows.help:
Syntax: .character deleted restore #guid|$name [$newname] [#new account]

Restores deleted characters.
If $name is supplied, only characters with that string in their name will be restored, if $guid is supplied, only the character with that GUID will be restored.
If $newname is set, the character will be restored with that name instead of the original one. If #newaccount is set, the character will be restored to specific account character list. This works only with one character!

rows.name: account set password
rows.help:
Syntax: .account set password (#accountId|$accountName) $password $password

Set password for account.

rows.name: lookup account name
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup account name $accountpart [#limit] 

 Searchs accounts, which username including $accountpart with optional parametr #limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: lookup player account
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup player account $accountpart [#limit] 

 Searchs players, which account username including $accountpart with optional parametr #limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: lookup player email
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup player email $emailpart [#limit] 

 Searchs players, which account email including $emailpart with optional parametr #limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: lookup player ip
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup player ip $ippart [#limit] 

 Searchs players, which account last used ip inluding $ippart (textual) with optional parametr #limit of results. If #limit not provided expected 100.

rows.name: server log level
rows.help:
Syntax: .server log level [#level]

Show or set server log level (0 - errors only, 1 - basic, 2 - detail, 3 - debug).

rows.name: go object
rows.help:
Syntax: .go object (#gameobject_guid|$gameobject_name|id #gameobject_id)
Teleport your character to gameobject with guid #gameobject_guid, or teleport your character to gameobject with name including as part $gameobject_name substring, or teleport your character to a gameobject that was spawned from the template with this entry #gameobject_id.

rows.name: auction
rows.help:
Syntax: .auction

Show your team auction store.

rows.name: auction alliance
rows.help:
Syntax: .auction alliance

Show alliance auction store independent from your team.

rows.name: auction goblin
rows.help:
Syntax: .auction goblin

Show goblin auction store common for all teams.

rows.name: auction horde
rows.help:
Syntax: .auction horde

Show horde auction store independent from your team.

rows.name: trigger
rows.help:
Syntax: .trigger [#trigger_id|$trigger_shift-link|$trigger_target_shift-link]

Show detail infor about areatrigger with id #trigger_id or trigger id associated with shift-link. If areatrigger id or shift-link not provided then selected nearest areatrigger at current map.

rows.name: go trigger
rows.help:
Syntax: .go trigger (#trigger_id|$trigger_shift-link|$trigger_target_shift-link) [target]

Teleport your character to areatrigger with id #trigger_id or trigger id associated with shift-link. If additional arg "target" provided then character will teleported to areatrigger target point.

rows.name: trigger near
rows.help:
Syntax: .trigger near [#distance]

Output areatriggers at distance #distance from player. If #distance not provided use 10 as default value.

rows.name: debug modvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug modvalue #field [int|float| &= | |= | &=~ ] #value

Modify the field #field of the selected target by value #value. If no target is selected, set the content of your field.

Use type arg for set mode of modification: int (normal add/subtract #value as decimal number), float (add/subtract #value as float number), &= (bit and, set to 0 all bits in value if it not set to 1 in #value as hex number), |= (bit or, set to 1 all bits in value if it set to 1 in #value as hex number), &=~ (bit and not, set to 0 all bits in value if it set to 1 in #value as hex number). By default expect integer add/subtract.

rows.name: debug setitemvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug setitemvalue #guid #field [int|hex|bit|float] #value

Set the field #field of the item #itemguid in your inventroy to value #value.

Use type arg for set input format: int (decimal number), hex (hex value), bit (bitstring), float. By default expect integer input format.

rows.name: debug setvalue
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug setvalue #field [int|hex|bit|float] #value

Set the field #field of the selected target to value #value. If no target is selected, set the content of your field.

Use type arg for set input format: int (decimal number), hex (hex value), bit (bitstring), float. By default expect integer input format.

rows.name: debug spellmods
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug spellmods (flat|pct) #spellMaskBitIndex #spellModOp #value

Set at client side spellmod affect for spell that have bit set with index #spellMaskBitIndex in spell family mask for values dependent from spellmod #spellModOp to #value.

rows.name: send mass items
rows.help:
Syntax: .send mass items #racemask|$racename|alliance|horde|all "#subject" "#text" itemid1[:count1] itemid2[:count2] ... itemidN[:countN]

Send a mail to players. Subject and mail text must be in "". If for itemid not provided related count values then expected 1, if count > max items in stack then items will be send in required amount stacks. All stacks amount in mail limited to 12.

rows.name: send mass mail
rows.help:
Syntax: .send mass mail #racemask|$racename|alliance|horde|all "#subject" "#text"

Send a mail to players. Subject and mail text must be in "".

rows.name: send mass money
rows.help:
Syntax: .send mass money #racemask|$racename|alliance|horde|all "#subject" "#text" #money

Send mail with money to players. Subject and mail text must be in "".

rows.name: gm setview
rows.help:
Syntax: .gm setview

Set farsight view on selected unit. Select yourself to set view back.

rows.name: lookup pool
rows.help:
Syntax: .lookup pool $pooldescpart

List of pools (anywhere) with substring in description.

rows.name: pool list
rows.help:
Syntax: .pool list

List of pools with spawn in current map (only work in instances. Non-instanceable maps share pool system state os useless attempt get all pols at all continents.

rows.name: pool spawns
rows.help:
Syntax: .pool spawns #pool_id

List current creatures/objects listed in pools (or in specific #pool_id) and spawned (added to grid data, not meaning show in world.

rows.name: pool
rows.help:
Syntax: .pool #pool_id

Pool information and full list creatures/gameobjects included in pool.

rows.name: debug spellcoefs
rows.help:
Syntax: .debug spellcoefs #spellid

Show default calculated and DB stored coefficients for direct/dot heal/damage.

rows.name: npc aiinfo
rows.help:
Syntax: .npc npc aiinfo

Show npc AI and script information.

rows.name: auction item
rows.help:
Syntax: .auction item (alliance|horde|goblin) #itemid[:#itemcount] [[[#minbid] #buyout] [short|long|verylong]

Add new item (in many stackes if amount grater stack size) to specific auction house at short|long|verylogn perios similar same settings in auction in game dialog. Created auction not have owner.

rows.name: ahbot items amount
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount $GreyItems $WhiteItems $GreenItems $BlueItems $PurpleItems $OrangeItems $YellowItems

Set amount of each items color be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount grey
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount grey $GreyItems

Set amount of Grey color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount white
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount white $WhiteItems

Set amount of White color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount green
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount green $GreenItems

Set amount of Green color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount blue
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount blue $BlueItems

Set amount of Blue color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount purple
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount purple $PurpleItems

Set amount of Purple color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount orange
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount orange $OrangeItems

Set amount of Orange color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items amount yellow
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items amount yellow $YellowItems

Set amount of Yellow color items be selled on auction.

rows.name: ahbot items ratio
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items ratio $allianceratio $horderatio $neutralratio

Set ratio of items in 3 auctions house.

rows.name: ahbot items ratio alliance
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items ratio alliance $allianceratio

Set ratio of items in alliance auction house.

rows.name: ahbot items ratio horde
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items ratio horde $horderatio

Set ratio of items in horde auction house.

rows.name: ahbot items ratio neutral
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot items ratio neutral $neutralratio

Set ratio of items in $neutral auction house.

rows.name: ahbot rebuild
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot rebuild [all]

Expire all actual auction of ahbot except bided by player. Binded auctions included to expire if "all" option used. Ahbot re-fill auctions base at current settings then.

rows.name: ahbot reload
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot reload

Reload AHBot settings from configuration file.

rows.name: ahbot status
rows.help:
Syntax: .ahbot status [all]

Show current ahbot state data in short form, and with "all" with details.
